name: H.O.P
description:
Donations very much appreciated!

H.O.P (Heights Or Plummeting) -

 A deadly rat is on loose! You need to get through 16  levels and 2 humorous bosses and take down that rat! If you're willing to take some extra challenge on, try out the Hard Hops, news is that no-one makes it alive, can you?

CONTROLS

• X / Mouse button to jump

• X to enter

• Arrow keys to move around the level select

• Backspace to go to level select

FEATURING

•  16 (Main) + 4 (Hard hops)  hand crafted levels

•  2 bosses

•  Medium gameplay length ~ 20 - 40 minutes

•  Amazing level design

Thanks so much for playing!

ATTRIBUTIONS 

Main music: https://chpdmg.bandcamp.com/track/pagoda-man-throw-down

Boss music: https://chpdmg.bandcamp.com/track/i-aint-never-good-enough

Thanks to https://spacespy64.itch.io/ for the first three levels of hard hops.
